channel.title: Music on xhocquet.info
channel.description: Recent content in Music on xhocquet.info

item.title: Music Organization: Utility Playlists
item.description: This is part 3 of my music organization series. Check out part 1 and part 2 for the full context. The Problem with Discovery After setting up beets and getting my library properly organized, I found myself facing a new challenge: actually using my music collection. Having thousands of tracks properly tagged and organized is great, but it doesn’t solve the fundamental problem of music discovery and curation. I was spending more time browsing through folders than actually listening to music.

item.title: Artist of the Month - 11.2020 - Tobi Lou
item.description: I wanted to try a new series on music to try and spur some writing! My thought was that I hope to discover at least one new great artist a month, and that writing about them should be easy if I really like them! This month, we’ll start with hip-hop which should be a common theme through these posts. My artist of choice this month is Tobi Lou a Nigeria-to-Chicago rapper whose unique style is endearing and captivating.
